sys_remote_update_set.description: Created in order to add comment section in enhancement form and create two ACL(s) to allow for users to make attachments and customer notes
sys_remote_update_set.name: ENHC0010227_v6

sys_update_xml.name: sys_security_acl_0bcff9740a0006d400ae1a384168533a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>false</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition/><description>Allow create for records in sys_attachment, if the ACL script returns true.</description><name>sys_attachment</name><operation display_value="create">create</operation><script><![CDATA[answer = getAttachmentCreateAnswer();

function getAttachmentCreateAnswer() {
    if (current.table_name.nil())
        return true;

    // If the attachment is from live feed,
    // allow it to be attached.
    if (current.table_name == 'live_profile')
        return current.table_sys_id == new GlideappLiveProfile().getID();

    // Remove prefix
    var tableName = current.table_name;
    var invisible_prefix = "invisible.";
    if (tableName.startsWith("invisible."))
        tableName = tableName.substring(10);

    var parentRecord = new GlideRecord(tableName);
    if (!parentRecord.isValid())
        return true;

    if (!parentRecord.get(current.table_sys_id))
        return true;

    // outgoing emails created by Email Client
    if (current.table_name == "sys_email" && parentRecord.weight == -1 && parentRecord.type == "send-ignored")
        return true;

    return parentRecord.canWrite();
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2011-02-09 19:05:02</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>0bcff9740a0006d400ae1a384168533a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>62</sys_mod_count><sys_name>sys_attachment</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Contextual Security Rules" source="com.glide.acl.service">36bea942fc321000666bda4bebb663ee</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_0bcff9740a0006d400ae1a384168533a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>rwKeller</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-15 17:31:27</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sc_cat_item_producer_6717fa3713864f80cb92b7a66144b0c9
sys_update_xml.payload:
trueon_bothfalsefalsee15706fc0a0a0aa7007fc21e1ab70c2f01970-01-03 00:00:00This is an enhancement request. The goal of this form is to provide an increase or improvement in quality, value, or extent to a specified application.

Please fill out all fields and a ticket will be generated to the designated application owner. If there are any questions or concerns, please open a ticket 

to the service desk and they will route the issue accordingly.

My Enhancements
